name: 研究員
message: "Well... I think it should be fine now."

name: 研究員
message: "But you know, I was really surprised when I took a look at it. 98% of its neural net was damaged. Normally you'd just dispose of something like that."

name: 研究員
message: "Restoring something from that state should have been impossible."

name: タエ
message: "It did take six months. All I did was repair the framework. The actual migration was all you."

name: 研究員
message: "Oh no. The work you did was nothing short of a miracle."

name: 研究員
message: "That said, I'm glad we managed to find a host body in such pristine condition. It would have been much harder without a body from the same line."

name: タエ
message: "Thank Toue for building so many of them. Gives me chills to think about 'em overrunning the island."

name: 研究員
message: "Yeah... Well, why don't we start him up to test the system?"

name: 研究員
message: "I... I'm sure I left him right here..."
